DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare effectiveness , tolerability , efficacy currently available atypical antipsychotic drug olanzapine ( 2.5-20 mg/day ) , quetiapine ( 100-800 mg/day ) risperidone ( 0.5-4 mg/day ) patient schizophrenia , schizophreniform disorder , schizoaffective disorder experience first psychotic episode .
DOC.brief_title: CAFE Comparison Atypicals First Episode Psychosis
DOC.criteria: Patients must meet criterion schizophreniform disorder , schizophrenia , schizoaffective disorder psychotic symptom last 160 month Psychotic symptom must persist least one month , thn 5 year ( 60 month ) Patients must previous history drug treatment ( great total 16 week ) antipsychotic Patients history psychotic disorder recovery period least 3 month Female patient pregnant nursing Patients know history mental retardation
